items.title: Use the Military Sleep Method to Fall Asleep Within 2 Minutes, Starting Tonight
items.description: This technique developed by the Navy to help pilots just might help you fall asleep a lot faster.

items.description: As we celebrate the end of the New Year, it is good to remember that there is no true ending, but just a new beginning.

items.title: Want to Change Someone’s Behavior? Understand How the Brain Builds Habits, According to Neuroscience
items.description: Want to change your behavior? How about your consumers’ behavior? A new Georgetown study reveals how overlooked cues are the key.
